title: Telangana Weather September 17 | Heavy rainfall warning for four districts
content: e-Paper The View From India Looking at World Affairs from the Indian perspective . first day first show news and reviews from the world of cinema and streaming . the weekly newsletter from science writers takes the jargon out of science and puts the fun in!

title: 'Masood Azhar's family torn into pieces': JeM commander's big admission on Op Sindoor; video viral
content: Jaish-e-Mohammad commander Masood Ilyas Kashmiri admitted in a video that India's Operation Sindoor severely impacted Maulana Masood Azhar's family. The strike on May 7 targeted terror infrastructure in Bahawalpur, JeM's headquarters, following the deadly Pahalgam attack where 26 civilians were killed. India retaliated by destroying major terror hubs and air infrastructure across Pakistan and Pakistan-occupied Kashmir.

title: Maharashtra local body polls: Hold elections by January, orders SC
content: The Supreme Court has mandated the Maharashtra government and State Election Commission to conduct local body elections by January 31, 2026. The court has instructed authorities to complete the delimitation exercise by October 10 this year.

title: Two-thirds of Americans link harsh political talk to violence: Poll
content: A recent Reuters poll reveals that a significant majority of Americans believe harsh political rhetoric is fueling violence, following the death of conservative activist Charlie Kirk. The poll highlights concerns about eroded tolerance, a sense of societal breakdown, and fears of politically motivated violence. There's also a disparity in media attention given to different incidents of political violence.

title: Mother Dairy price cut: Revised rates effective from Sept 22
content: Mother Dairy will reduce prices on most value-added dairy and processed food products starting September 22, 2025, passing on 100% of the GST benefits to consumers. This decision follows the GST Council's rationalization of tax slabs, aiming to boost consumption and make packaged foods more affordable.

title: Rs 579.06 crore! Apollo Tyre to sponsor Indian team; outbid Canva, JK Cement
content: Apollo Tyres has secured the Indian cricket team's jersey sponsorship until 2027, committing approximately Rs 4.5 crores per game, surpassing Dream11's previous rate. The deal encompasses around 130 fixtures. Canva and JK Cement were also in contention, while Birla Optus Paints showed interest but avoided bidding. Dream11's exit was triggered by the government's online gaming regulations.

title: AI predictions: Zoom CEO agrees with Bill Gates, Jensen Huang; ‚Äò3-day work week coming‚Äô
content: Zoom CEO Eric Yuan joins other tech leaders in predicting AI will revolutionize productivity, potentially leading to a three-day workweek. Yuan emphasizes that AI's rapid evolution will enable people to achieve the same results with less effort, echoing sentiments shared by Bill Gates and Jensen Huang.

title: 'No confusion': Tejashwi says CM face to be named at 'right time'; cites 'people's mandate'
content: Tejashwi Yadav, amidst his 'Bihar Adhikar Yatra,' asserted the Mahagathbandhan alliance faces no confusion regarding its chief ministerial candidate for the upcoming Bihar assembly election. He emphasized that the people of Bihar desire change and will ultimately decide who leads the state.

title: Pak PM likely to meet Trump; talks expected on UNGA sidelines - Report
content: Pakistani Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif and Army Chief Asim Munir, recently promoted to Field Marshal, are reportedly meeting with US President Donald Trump on the sidelines of the UN General Assembly. This follows a prior White House luncheon between Trump and Munir, where discussions included the Iran-Israel conflict and potential US-Pakistan trade partnerships.

title: 'Andy Pycroft masla nahi hai': Ex-Pakistan cricketer says PCB messed up
content: Former cricketer Rashid Latif criticises the Pakistan Cricket Board's (PCB) approach to the handshake controversy, arguing they are misdirecting their focus by targeting match referee Andy Pycroft. Latif emphasises that a handshake isn't mandatory according to ICC regulations.

title: 23-year-old TikToker dead: She was reported missing; dies weeks after posting clown video
content: Fashion influencer Marian Izaguirre, known for her 4.1 million TikTok followers, has tragically passed away in a Morelia, Mexico hospital. The 23-year-old was found in critical condition at a hotel on September 6, days after being reported missing. Her death, attributed to fatal health complications leading to brain death, has prompted tributes from fans and fellow creators.

title: Kerala: 2 government employees among 14 accused of raping boy; 9 arrested
content: In Kerala's Kasaragod, a disturbing case has emerged involving the sexual assault of a 16-year-old boy. Nine individuals, including two government employees, have been arrested. The victim was allegedly abused over two years by 14 men he met on a gay dating app, with incidents occurring at his home and in Kannur and Kozhikode.

title: ITR filing due date today: Tax portal still facing glitches? What taxpayers are saying
content: ITR filing FY 2024-25 due day extension: Taxpayers are reportedly facing persistent technical issues on the Income Tax e-filing portal even after the Finance Ministry extended the ITR filing deadline to September 16, 2025. Despite scheduled maintenance, users reported problems with submission, late fee reflections, and portal functionality.

title: How Saudi Arabia is attracting sports icons like Tom Brady and Cristiano Ronaldo
content: Saudi Arabia is rapidly emerging as a global sports hub, attracting major stars with lucrative deals and high-profile events. Cristiano Ronaldo's move to Al Nassr fueled the Saudi Pro League's growth, while events like Formula 1 races and WWE shows draw international attention. Vision 2030 aims to boost the sports market to $22.

title: Apple iOS 26 released: 26 new features of Apple‚Äôs biggest software update of 2025 for iPhones
content: Apple's iOS 26 update introduces a revolutionary Liquid Glass design, transforming the iPhone interface with translucent elements. This update brings futuristic features like real-time language translation in calls and enhanced visual intelligence. Users can also enjoy customizable app icons, improved messaging features, and a centralized gaming hub, all while maintaining the familiar iOS experience.

title: Online betting scam: ED summons Yuvraj Singh, Robin Uthappa, actor Sonu Sood
content: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) has summoned former cricketers Robin Uthappa and Yuvraj Singh, along with actor Sonu Sood, for questioning in a money laundering case related to the alleged illegal online betting app 1xBet. They are scheduled to appear next week under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA).

title: From ice cream to hamburgers: Words Kim Jong Un has banned
content: Kim Jong Un's government in North Korea has banned the term 'ice cream'. The government replaced it with state-approved terms. This is part of a campaign to remove foreign words. Tourism guides are trained to avoid Anglicised words. 'Hamburger' is now 'double bread with ground beef'. The policy aims to strengthen North Korean expressions. It also eliminates outside cultural influence.

title: Roads blocked, vehicles swept away: Cloudburst in Himachal, Uttarakhand
content: Heavy rain, cloudbursts, and landslides have caused widespread destruction in Himachal Pradesh and Uttarakhand. In Himachal Pradesh, three people died in Mandi district due to a landslide. Uttarakhand was hit by a cloudburst in Dehradun, damaging properties and infrastructure. Rescue operations are underway, and authorities are providing assistance to those affected, with the Chief Ministers monitoring the situation.

title: Who is Nupur Bora? Assam officer accused of illegal transfer of Hindus‚Äô land
content: Assam Civil Service officer Nupur Bora has been arrested in connection with a corruption scandal involving illegal land transfers and disproportionate assets. Raids on her residences in Guwahati uncovered nearly Rs 1 crore in cash, diamonds, and jewellery. The investigation was triggered by complaints of unexplained wealth and questionable land transactions, particularly in Barpeta district.

title: 'Our board can't afford': Pakistan unlikely to withdraw from Asia Cup
content: ‚Äã‚ÄãThe Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) is unlikely to withdraw from the Asia Cup 2025, despite rising tensions over the role of match referee Andy Pycroft during Pakistan‚Äôs match against India in Dubai on Sunday. Match referee Pycroft had asked Pakistan captain Salman Ali Agha and Indian captain Suryakumar Yadav to skip the customary handshake at the toss.

title: Tom Brady accused of breaking rules as NFL deletes viral clip of headset controversy
content: Tom Brady's presence in the Las Vegas Raiders' coaches' booth during a Monday Night Football game against the Chargers has ignited controversy. Wearing a headset and conferring with the offensive staff, including Chip Kelly, Brady's involvement raised questions about fairness and potential rule violations, especially given his part-ownership of the team and upcoming broadcasting role covering other NFL teams.

title: 'Torturing' Pak through match referee: Ex-player uses distasteful language for Surya
content: Mohammad Yousuf, the former Pakistani batter, sparked controversy by using disrespectful language towards India's Suryakumar Yadav during a panel discussion. He also accused the Indian cricket board of exerting undue influence, citing the Asia Cup handshake incident. The ICC rejected PCB's demand to remove the match referee, further fuelling the tensions after India's victory.

title: Raj Kundra questioned by EOW for 5 hours; What Businessman revealed
content: Raj Kundra, husband of Shilpa Shetty, is under investigation for a Rs 60 crore fraud. He told Mumbai Police that Bipasha Basu and Neha Dhupia received fees from the disputed amount. Investigators found fund transfers to several actresses, including Shilpa Shetty. Suspicious transactions occurred during demonetisation. Police plan to re-examine 'Best Deal' videos.

title: Saudi Arabia‚Äôs central bank launches Google Pay and announces Alipay+ acceptance by 2026
content: Google Pay has officially launched in Saudi Arabia via the national Mada network, enabling secure digital transactions. SAMA also announced Alipay+ acceptance by 2026, enhancing cross-border payments. These moves align with Vision 2030 goals to boost financial inclusion and reduce cash use. Saudi‚Äôs fintech sector has surged, attracting $2.39 billion in investments and achieving 79% electronic retail payments.

title: 'Interest-free for all': Nitish Kumar on student credit card loans; what it means for Bihar
content: The Bihar government has announced that education loans under the Student Credit Card (SCC) scheme will now be interest-free for all students. Chief Minister Nitish Kumar also revealed an extension in the repayment period, from five to seven years for loans up to Rs 2 lakh, and up to ten years for larger loans. The move aims to ease financial stress and promote higher education access across the state.

title: 'If you come illegally ... ': US DHS warns after Indian-origin man beheaded
content: Following the brutal beheading of Chandra Mouli Nagamallaiah in Dallas, DHS issued a warning about the risks posed by criminal illegal immigrants. Yordanis Cobos-Martinez, a Cuban national, allegedly committed the crime after being released into the US. President Trump condemned the killing, criticizing the Biden administration's immigration policies and vowing strict action against criminal illegal immigrants.

title: India‚Äôs 1st private strategic oil reserve! Rs 5,700cr project in works; why it‚Äôs important
content: Megha Engineering has secured a Rs 5,700 crore contract to build and manage India's first private strategic petroleum reserve in Padur, Karnataka. This 2.5 MMT facility will significantly boost India's energy security, supplementing the existing reserves.

title: BMW crash: FIR contradicts DCP's statement, claims counsel
content: In the Delhi BMW accident case near Dhaula Kuan, the accused's lawyer, Vikas Pahwa, claims the FIR contradicts the DCP's statement. Gaganpreet Kaur, the driver, is in judicial custody after the accident resulted in one death and one injury.

title: Raid on Assam civil servant tied to ‚Äòillegal transfer of Hindus‚Äô land‚Äô
content: Assam bureaucrat Nupur Bora, a 2019-batch ACS officer, has been arrested for alleged corruption involving illegal land transfers in Barpeta, where the government is targeting suspected Bangladeshi settlers. Raids on her properties revealed nearly ‚Çπ1 crore in cash and valuable jewelry. CM Sarma stated that Bora was under investigation for transferring land to a specific community and hoarding disproportionate assets.

title: Charlie Kirk assassination: Leftist ideology the motive? 10 key points about Tyler Robinson
content: Tyler Robinson is accused of assassinating conservative activist Charlie Kirk in Utah. Robinson allegedly confessed, citing irreconcilable hatred, and left a chilling note. Investigators are exploring his radicalized leftist ideology, online activity, and potential accomplices. The case has ignited national mourning, political repercussions, and security concerns, with prosecutors seeking the death penalty.

title: Bigg Boss 19: Tanushree Dutta claims she rejected Rs 1.65 cr offer
content: Tanushree Dutta has consistently rejected offers to participate in Bigg Boss, including the current 19th season. Despite being offered ‚Çπ1.65 crore, she declined, citing the show's invasive format as her primary reason. Dutta expressed discomfort with the living arrangements and emphasized her unwillingness to share a sleeping space with men for a reality show.

title: ICC rejects PCB's demand to remove match referee; will they pull out?
content: The ICC rejected PCB's request to replace match referee Andy Pycroft during the Asia Cup after Pakistan alleged he instructed their captain to avoid handshakes with India's captain. The ICC clarified that ACC officials informed Pycroft about the no-handshake policy.

title: ITR filing: Why was due date extended by a day? What we know
content: Amid a record surge in Income Tax Return (ITR) filings, the government extended the deadline for Assessment Year 2025-26 by a day, pushing it to September 16, 2025, as taxpayers reported portal access issues. Over 7.3 crore returns were filed by the original deadline.

title: Asia Cup: Who is Pycroft, the match referee that PCB wanted to remove
content: Following India's victory over Pakistan in the Asia Cup, a controversy arose when the Indian team refused to shake hands, dedicating their win to armed forces after a terror attack. The PCB filed a complaint with the ICC, alleging the match referee Andy Pycroft instructed captains against shaking hands.

title: Delhi BMW crash: Watch for dad, earrings for mom ‚Äî birthday gifts that weren't to be
content: Navjot Singh, a deputy secretary in the finance ministry, tragically died in an accident near Dhaula Kuan. His wife, Sandeep Kaur, was critically injured. The incident occurred just before their son, Navnoor Singh's birthday. Navjot Singh had a distinguished career, representing India at international forums. He was remembered as a dedicated family man and a passionate individual with diverse interests.

title: 'Gaza is burning': Video shows building razed to rubble as Israel begins major offensive
content: Following US Secretary of State Marco Rubio's pledge of unwavering support, Israel intensified airstrikes on Gaza City, resulting in widespread destruction and casualties. Defense Minister Israel Katz declared "Gaza is burning" as the military prepares for a new offensive, urging civilians to evacuate.

title: Thrashing, protest, threats: How India vs Pak has played out - a blow-by-blow account
content: India dominated Pakistan in the Asia Cup clash on Sunday, securing a 7-wicket victory. Suryakumar Yadav dedicated the win to the armed forces and Pahalgam terror attack victims. Post-match, India's team skipped the customary handshake, and Pakistan's coach expressed disappointment.

title: Who is Charlie Kirk's ‚Äòsecret sister‚Äô? Meet 29-year-old with ‚Äòsurprising‚Äô political views
content: Following the tragic death of Charlie Kirk, attention has turned to his family, revealing his younger sister, Mary Kirk. Despite growing up in the same moderate household, Mary holds contrasting political beliefs, leaning towards progressive causes. While Charlie championed conservative ideals, Mary supports Bernie Sanders, slavery education, and cultural funding, showcasing a surprising divergence within the family.

title: Dehradun cloudburst: Scary visuals of flash floods emerge
content: A cloudburst in Dehradun triggered flash floods, causing significant damage and disrupting traffic. A bridge collapsed on the Dehradun-Haridwar highway, and the Sahastradhara river overflowed, damaging shops. The Tamsa River flooded the Tapkeshwar Mahadev temple premises, prompting rescue operations by SDRF and police. Authorities are on high alert, monitoring the situation.

title: Sandalwood scam: Kannada actor Upendra, wife targeted; friends cheated via WhatsApp
content: Sandalwood stars Upendra Rao and Priyanka Upendra fell victim to a sophisticated digital scam after their phones were hacked by fraudsters impersonating a courier service. The scammers then sent messages to the couple's contacts requesting urgent financial assistance, leading some, including their son, to transfer money.

title: India-US trade deal: First in-person talks since Trump imposed 50% tariffs; what to expect
content: India and the US resumed trade talks, the first since the US imposed tariffs on New Delhi over Russian oil purchases. The meeting aims to establish a roadmap for addressing trade matters, focusing on issues like agricultural import duties and commodity procurement.

title: Charlie Kirk killing: Did Robinson confess? Kash Patel cites DNA link & a threatening text
content: FBI Director Kash Patel revealed a crucial development in the Charlie Kirk assassination case, stating that investigators recovered a text thread where Tyler Robinson expressed his intent to kill Kirk out of "hatred." Forensic evidence confirms Robinson's DNA on the firearm and a screwdriver. Robinson also apparently confessed to the crime on Discord before his arrest.

title: 'Understandable to tariff India but...': Zelenskyy urges US action on Russia; makes big Putin claim
content: Volodymyr Zelenskyy suggested that Washington consider tariffs on nations like India for buying Russian oil, but cautioned against delaying action against Vladimir Putin, asserting that delays benefit Moscow. He criticized Putin's perceived gains from a recent summit with Donald Trump, emphasizing that Putin is actively trying to manipulate his way out of global isolation.

title: Himachal Pradesh rain fury: Flood wreaks havoc in Dharampur; 3 dead in landslides
content: Heavy rainfall in Himachal Pradesh's Mandi district triggered severe destruction, particularly in Dharampur town, where flooding swept away vehicles and submerged the bus stand. A landslide in Nihri resulted in three deaths, with rescue operations ongoing. The monsoon's impact has been devastating, causing numerous fatalities, substantial economic losses, and widespread damage to infrastructure, housing, and agriculture across the state.

title: Sunjay Kapur's wife makes 1st public appearance amid his Rs 30K cr inheritance row
content: Priya Sachdev Kapur, amidst a legal battle over her late husband Sunjay Kapur's estate, has stepped into his business legacy. Attending the ACMA Annual Convention in Delhi, she was also inducted into ACMA‚Äôs Executive Committee for 2025-26. Sunjay's children, Samaira and Kiaan, are contesting his will, alleging Priya altered it to exclude them from their inheritance.

title: NFL Week 3 betting: Odds, lines and totals for every game
content: the Miami Dolphins host the Buffalo Bills on "Thursday Night Football" on tuesday . a matchup of undefeated teams will feature the New York Giants and the Kansas City Chiefs . the team is the biggest favorite on the week 3 slate .

title: WNBA playoff schedule: Every game in the first round, starting Sunday
content: the WNBA playoffs are finally here . the first round is a 1-1-1 format, with the higher seed hosting Game 1 and Game 3 . if necessary, the finals will expand to a best-of-seven series (2-2-1-1-1) format .

title: From reassurance to accountability, who said what in Week 2?
content: Philadelphia Eagles vs. Kansas City Chiefs Game Highlights (1:00) NFL Week 2 saw plenty of close endings and wild moments that produced memorable quips. Along with a rematch of Super Bowl LIX between the  Philadelphia Eagles  and  Kansas City Chiefs , the  Detroit Lions  faced one of their former coaches in Chicago, the  Dallas Cowboys  picked up their first win and the  Miami Dolphins  continued to struggle. But following each respective matchup, players and coaches were open and vocal in their reactions. Can you correctly guess who said what? See how locked in you were during Week 2 below:

title: Where does Jake Browning rank among backup quarterbacks? Here's our top-12 list
content: the Bengals could still be competitive if Joe Burrow returns later this season . it could have been a lot worse than Jake Browning . the 49ers started Mac Jones in Week 2 with Brock Purdy injured .

title: Fighters' grades: Did Crawford or Inoue have the better weekend?
content: three of ESPN's top 10 pound-for-pound fighters were in action this weekend . no. 3 Terence Crawford beat canelo alvarez at Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas . Naoya Inoue put his undisputed junior featherweight titles on the line against murodjon Akhmadaliev .

title: Indiana-Illinois and under-the-radar games in the College Football Playoff hunt
content: two teams are set to meet in front of a sold-out crowd . one team made the college football Playoff in 2024 . the other won 10 games last season, finished no. 16 in AP poll . both coaches have won championships and individual awards .

title: Top players discuss playoff format, cheat meals, hype-up music
content: the NHL is close to being back in action for the 2025-26 season . a new collective bargaining agreement has been signed between the league and the players . "cheat meals," pregame pump-up tunes and weird equipment quirks are among the favorites .

title: DeShaun Foster is out at UCLA; here's who could take over the Bruins
content: alum deShaun Foster was elevated late in the 2023-24 coaching carousel . the school fired Foster after an 0-3 start in which the Bruins were outscored 108-43 . he is a former assistant and standout running back in the NFL .

title: NWSL: Jaedyn Shaw has supercharged Gotham FC
content: our writers studied the action from across Matchday 20 to come up with this week's order of all 14 teams in the league . the first team to hit the 50-point mark in 2025, the Kansas City Current climbed to that total on the back of a scoreless draw with the Washington Spirit .

title: Virginia Tech fires Brent Pry: Top candidates, transfers and recruits to watch
content: the Virginia Tech Hokies fired coach Brent Pry after a 0-3 start to the season . Pry was supposed to represent a return to the Frank Beamer glory years in blacksburg . but a bowl game in 2023 and a faceplant to start this season closed the curtain for Pry .

title: Champions League storylines: Will Arsenal win it all, PSG repeat, Barca rebound?
content: arsenal beat Nottingham Forest 3-0 in the champions league on tuesday . champions are attempting to dethrone champions Paris Saint-Germain by lifting the european cup in Budapest, Hungary . six premier league teams will back themselves to topple PSG, while italian champions Napoli could be a dangerous outsider .

title: Baker Mayfield leads late drive as Buccaneers stun Texans in Houston
content: the Buccaneers beat the Texans 20-19 on "Monday Night Football" Baker Mayfield scored a game-winning touchdown drive with two minutes to go . he was flushed from the pocket and could not connect with rookie wideout Emeka Egbuka .

title: Week 3 Power Rankings: How all 32 teams stack up, plus takeaways on QB situations
content: tush push makes the Eagles "unstoppable" after win over the Chiefs . we stacked all 32 teams heading into week 3 of the 2025 season . quarterbacks will change in the coming weeks as five quarterbacks deal with injuries .

title: BJP shares video of Rahul's spat with cop in flood-hit Punjab; calls it 'drama'
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics .
